casebody.data:
[Civil No. 782.] PASQUAL NIGRO, Appellant, v. ALFONZO HIDALGO DE MERCIER, Appellee. APPEAL from the District Court of the Second Judicial District in and for the County of Gila. F. M. Doan, Judge. A. R. Edwards, Attorney for Appellant. J. S. Sniffen, and Robert E. Morrison, Attorneys for Appellee. February 11, 1902.

Affirmed.
